name: BeginAnimationGroup

arguments.name: weight
arguments.desc: Weight [0,1] of this group, default is 1.0

arguments.name: filter
arguments.desc: Name of the bone and its subtree that will be affected

examples: --This will blend an entire group with 50% influence
--You can also create a tree of groups, blending is performed in a depth-first order
description: You can group looping animations together and use the result of those to blend to target.
PlayAnimation will not work here since they are processed last separately from blendgroups.
